name: Dengeki PlayStation D90
synopsis: {{DengekiInfo}} This disc was issued with Dengeki PlayStation 347-th edition. The issue consists of two DVDs. The first is a video only DVD with game guides, footage for some games (like ''Final Fantasy XII'', ''Tales of the Abyss'', ''Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 12'' and others). The second is a PS2 data DVD contains:
